Published October 25 2014

The Zombie iPad

The Zombie iPad — Ben Brooks argues that keeping the old iPad Mini (sans-Retina) around helps lower the bar to entry for new iOS users. I think that non-Retina screens look like garbage, but the cheaper prices ($249) can’t be argued against.

Enjoy your day.
